name: Gripping Shards
description: Conjure icy shards around you to skewer enemies in the area, immobilizing them for 3 seconds and dealing 511 Frost Damage every 1 second for 12 seconds.  Enemies hit are overcome with bitter cold, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Damage done is based on your Max Health and has a higher chance to apply the Chilled status effect.
effectLines: Immobilizes enemies around you when cast.
coefDescription: Conjure icy shards around you to skewer enemies in the area, immobilizing them for 3 seconds and dealing $1 Frost Damage every 1 second for 12 seconds.  Enemies hit are overcome with bitter cold, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Damage done is based on your Max Health and has a higher chance to apply the Chilled status effect.
